hero.slogan: Uniting hearts, elevating souls, serving the community
hero.description: A non-political religious and social organization, guided by Cheikh Ahmad Tidjani Diabaté. Officially registered in Ivory Coast since 2010, we bring together a spiritual community of 45,000 followers united in peace and solidarity.
hero.unitedCommunity: A community united in faith and mutual support

bio.paragraph1: Imam of the Grand Mosque of Abobo and respected spiritual guide and peace ambassador in Ivory Coast, Cheikh Ahmad Tidjani Diabaté dedicates his life to teaching authentic Islamic values and serving the community.
bio.paragraph2: Under his enlightened leadership, AHLOUL BAIT has become a reference in spirituality, solidarity and social peace in Ivory Coast and around the world.

achievements: Recognized spiritual guide of the Tidjaniya path
Founder and Moral Authority of AHLOUL BAIT
Imam of the Grand Mosque of Abobo

team.title: A Dedicated Team
team.description: Our organization relies on a passionate team of committed men and women, united by the same values of spirituality, solidarity and service. Together, we work daily for the well-being of our community and the transmission of authentic Islamic teachings.

join.a: You can join our community by contacting us via WhatsApp, phone or by visiting our mosque in Abobo. We regularly organize welcome sessions for new members.

activities.a: We organize daily prayers, dhikr sessions, religious conferences, social actions, school support, and various community events throughout the year.

donations.a: You can make a donation by directly contacting our administration by phone or email. All donations are used for our social actions and community support.

prayers.a: Prayers take place at the Grand Mosque of Abobo. We welcome all believers for daily prayers and special events.

tidjaniya.a: The Tidjaniya is a Sufi brotherhood founded by Cheikh Ahmad Tijani. It emphasizes spiritual purification, dhikr and closeness to Allah through guided spiritual practices.
